name: Star Box
description:
star box is one of top 10 high EQ Puzzle game.Only 10 person can pass all 30 star box stages.
how many stages can you pass? Try star box right now!
The purpose of the game is to move the box to the cosmic black hole.
Be careful not to fly there is no gravity in space.
Every step you should have a wall blocking moves carefully considered a good fight to get better results now!

Supports two control modes:
1. Control the UFO by a virtual keyboard
2. control it by finger slide the screen

Elements introduced:
Common wall: UFO need the help of these walls eventually reach the black hole
Timing wall: will countdown after being hit, and finally disappeared,
Lightning wall: when passing through will be merged.
Surrounded boxes: all four lights around the box need to be lighted.
Portal: when you move to the portal will instantly be transferred to the same color portal
